comment.label_en: This query form allows you to determine which users are assigned to act upon a document that is currently in a workflow.
To use this query select a document name.

combo-editable.assistance_dql: select object_name from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id in(select r_component_id from dmi_package where r_workflow_id in (select r_object_id from dm_workflow where r_runtime_state = 1)) order by object_name
